sentence.Network_en: Aim To study the chemical constituents of Lentinus giganteus Berk.
sentence.Network_cn: 目的对真菌大杯香菇(LentinusgiganteusBerk )的化学成分进行研究.

sentence.Network_en: The nitrogenous substances - extracting technology by microwave from Lentinus edodes was studied.
sentence.Network_cn: 本试验以香菇为原料,对微波法提取香菇含氮物质的工艺进行了研究.

sentence.Network_en: The processing technique of health beverage from pear juice and Lentinus edodes polysaccharide has been studied.
sentence.Network_cn: 研究了富含香菇多糖的功能性果汁保健饮料的生产工艺.
